short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve your English communication with Ginger's all-in-one AI spelling and grammar checker!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ginger combines a contextual Grammar check with an AI-based Rephrase to ensure mistake-free texts and enhance your creativity and style.

What’s more, Ginger offers features like Synonyms lookup, Definitions dictionary and high-quality text Translation for 40+ languages.

The extension works directly in your preferred sites and corrects your texts as you type.

Perfect your writing for your business correspondences, academic assignments or social media presence.

----------------------------
Key features:
----------------------------

★ Works in real-time: get suggestions from Ginger as you type in Gmail, Whatsapp, Facebook, LinkedIn and all your favorite websites.

★ Focus on expressing your ideas, while Ginger takes care of your sentence structure, grammar, spelling and punctuation errors.

★ AI-powered Rephrase: explore alternative turns of phrase for your texts, while maintaining your intended message. 

★ Synonyms Lookup: double-click a word or select an expression and explore a rich variety of synonyms to find THE perfect match.

★ Definitions Dictionary: look up words while reading with a simple click.

★ Translation support for 40+ languages: instantly translate your texts, mails, posts or messages using neural machine translation.

----------------------------
Why is Ginger better?
----------------------------

★ Ginger goes beyond spelling and grammar. It analyses the entire sentences to suggest context-based corrections, including punctuation.

Example: 
Unfortunatly I couldn’t be their for the event. 

> Unfortunately, I couldn’t be there for the event.

★ In addition to grammar, exceptional writing requires attention to style. Rephrase complements grammar check by refining your prose, ensuring that every word resonates with the reader.

Example: 
Its a real god tool for peiple with troubles to writte arpopriately.

*Grammar Check*: 
> It's a really good tool for people with troubles to write appropriately.

* Grammar Check & Rephrase*: 
> It's an excellent tool for individuals who have trouble writing properly.
